title: Blended Learning Program for Understanding Metamorphism and Plate Tectonics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic geological concepts (rock cycle, fundamental principles of plate tectonics)
context.additional_context: Corporate job-linked training for working professionals, combining language domain knowledge with geoscience in the learning design.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the primary mechanisms of metamorphism (heat, pressure, chemical changes) and their tectonic plate associations.
Learners can identify key metamorphism-related terms (e.g., geothermal gradient, metamorphic zones) with 80% accuracy using a QR code assessment system.
Learners can confirm a 30%+ improvement in conceptual understanding by comparing pre- and post-video learning assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
